name: Matt Patrol
summary: Matthew "Matt" Householder programmed this a version of Moon Patrol for the Colecovision in 1984. Unfortunately, it was canceled by Atarisoft when he was about to finish the title screen. His work stayed as it was with a temporary title screen (Selma presents Matt Patrol). In 1996 he sold a copy to a collector and a few years later it leaked on the Internet.
